text: Mané is a town in Burkina Faso. It is the capital of Mane Department in Sanmatenga Province. Mané one of the Mossi principalities and was founded in the 16th century.Historical Dictionary of Burkina Faso, by Lawrence Rupley, Lamissa Bangali, Boureima Diamitani, 2013, Third edition, Scarecrow Press, Inc. ==References== Category:Populated places in the Centre-Nord Region Category:Sanmatenga Province
title: Mané, Burkina Faso
